This is a React + Vite + Tailwind CSS developer portfolio project. Please generate code that is modern, modular, and leverages framer-motion for animations. Organize features as reusable components and keep the codebase clean and maintainable.

Ensure that the code adheres to best practices for React development, including proper state management, component structure, and responsive design principles. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and ensure that the project is mobile-responsive.
Use the following folder structure for organization:

- src/
  - components/  # Reusable components
  - pages/       # Page components
  - assets/      # Images, icons, etc.
  - data/        # Static data (e.g., project info)
  - styles/      # Custom styles (if any)
- public/       # Public assets
- .github/      # GitHub-related files (e.g., workflows)

Make sure to include a README.md file with project details, features, and setup instructions. Also, maintain a CHANGELOG.md file to track changes and updates to the project.
